scripts.postinstall: react-native setup-ios-permissions && cd ios && pod install
scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm yarn.lock && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.ios:pod:reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/*
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn setDevelopment  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "gostornativeappservice-development"
scripts.ios:beta-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn setBeta  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "gostornativeappservice-beta"
scripts.ios:prod-release: yarn ios:clean && yarn ios:bundle:assets && yarn setProduction  react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "gostornativeappservice"
scripts.aos:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.aos:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.aos:DD-apk: yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:DR-apk: yarn setDevelopment &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SD-apk: yarn setBeta &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleBetaDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:SR-apk: yarn setBeta &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleBetaRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PD-apk: yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-apk: yarn setProduction &&  yarn aos:clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
scripts.aos:PR-Bundle: yarn setProduction &&  yarn clean && yarn aos:bundle:assets && yarn aos:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -9 java
